data.title: Emma Thompson Celebrity News and Gossip
data.text:
Hugh Jackman and Emma Thompson are set to star in Three Bags Full: A Sheep Detective Movie, and they’ll share the screen in the live-action comedy with a star-studded cast!

On Friday (June 7), it was announced that they’d be appearing in the movie, which will be directed by Kyle Balda. Craig Mazin handled the script.

The movie is based on a novel of the same name by Leonie Swann.

Head inside to find out who else will appear in the movie…More Here! »

Bridget Jones 4, aka Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy, is in production and we now know which stars from the first three films will be returning!

We’re happy to report that several stars from previous films will be back, but one big star’s name was glaringly left out of the press release and fans are concerned!

Keep reading to see who is returning for the fourth film…

A new Bridget Jones film, Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy, is officially in the works, and casting has just been announced!

We’re happy to report that three stars from previous films will be back, but one big star’s name was glaringly left out of the press release and fans are concerned!

Keep reading to see who is returning for the fourth film…

Love Actually is one of the most beloved holiday movies of all time and it is celebrating its 20th anniversary this year.

We decided to take a look at the cast list and see where everyone ranks in terms of net worth.

Some of the cast members were still relatively unknown when the movie was made and now they are huge stars around the world. The ensemble cast features so many people who are fan favorites today!

Browse through the slideshow to see where everyone ranks in terms of estimate net worth…

Sydney Sweeney and Noah Centineo hang out at the Giorgio Armani Privé Haute Couture Fall/Winter 2023/2024 show during Paris Fashion Week on Tuesday (July 4) in Paris, France.

The 25-year-old Euphoria actress and 27-year-old The Recruit actor posed for photos together while front row at the show. With their monochromatic black outfits, they made a striking pair.

Kate Hudson and fiance Danny Fujikawa attended together and were experts at contrast. The actress really popped while next to her partner in her blank and pink outfit. There were so many other stars on the guestlist, too.

Keep reading to find out more…More Here! »

Emma Thompson is one of the first celebs to arrive for King Charles’ Coronation!

The 64-year-old Oscar-winning actress and screenwriter was spotted with her husband Greg Wise while arriving at Westminster Abbey on Saturday morning (May 6) in London, England.

Emma was made a Dame (Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire) by Queen Elizabeth II back in 2018 for her services to drama.

Greg, 56, is an English actor and producer who played Louis, Earl Mountbatten of Burma in the first two seasons of Netflix’s The Crown. It must be very meta for him to be at the coronation now!

Here’s details on the schedule of events for King Charles‘ coronation, including where you can watch.

Browse through the gallery for more photos of Emma Thompson at the coronation… More Here! »
